title: Textile, 1920–30
dimensions:
warp: 51.5cm (20 1/4") weft: 16cm (6 1/4")
Pattern: Visual & technical repeat unit: height: 43.5cm (17 1/8")                                                   width: 16cm (6 1/4")
description: Alternation of a repeat of small rectangles in shades of brown and a stripe or band of scattered flowers on yellow-green. 3 colors: brown, grey, yellow-green.
